periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. East southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 1am, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. South wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 50 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 41. North northeast wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. North northeast wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 32. North northwest wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 61. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 32. North wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 54. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 40. Southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 63. South wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. South southwest wind around 9 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. Southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West wind around 8 mph.
